name: Hacktic
description:
Run through the ever changing cyberspace and hack as many consoles as you can! Each terminal you hack changes the cyberspace more and more. Each level is randomly generated to keep you on your toes. 

Controls

basic first person controls: 

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse for looking around
  • Spacebar for jumping
  • E to interact 

This project was originally made as an entry to Grads in Games' Search for a Star challenge
